# Aushnara College - Bangladesh's Premier Educational Institution
# Last Updated: 2026-02-22

# Institution Overview
Name: Aushnara College
Established: 2001
Location: 23/A, Dhanmondi R/A, Dhaka-1205, Bangladesh
Type: College & University
Website: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd
Contact: info@aushnaracollege.edu.bd | +880-2-58154892

# Quick Facts
Total Students: 47,520+
Faculty & Staff: 1,847
Academic Programs: 310+
Success Rate: 98.7%
Pass Rate (HSC): 97.3%

# Programs Offered
- HSC Programs: 3 (Science, Commerce, Arts)
- Undergraduate Programs: 110+ (Engineering, Medicine, Business, Science, Arts, Law, Architecture, Agriculture)
- Diploma Programs: 216+ (Engineering, IT, Business, Healthcare, Agriculture, Arts, Social Sciences, Vocational Skills)

# Key Features
1. Merit-Based Scholarships (up to 100% tuition waiver)
2. 98.3% Undergraduate Employment Rate
3. 96.8% Diploma Placement Rate
4. 150+ Industry Placement Partners
5. World-Class Faculty (PhD qualified)
6. International Accreditation (WHO for Medical Programs)
7. Research Excellence (15 Research Centers)
8. Modern Campus Infrastructure

# Admissions 2026-27
Application Period: December 1, 2026 - February 28, 2027
Admission Test: March 20-25, 2027
Classes Begin: July 1, 2027
Programs: HSC (Science, Commerce, Arts), Undergraduate (9 Faculties), Diploma (8 Categories)

# Academic Excellence
- 98.7% Overall Success Rate
- 97.3% HSC Pass Rate
- 98.3% Undergraduate Employment Rate (within 6 months)
- 96.8% Diploma Placement Rate
- Average Starting Salary (UG): ৳45,000-৳85,000/month
- Average Starting Salary (Diploma): ৳25,000-৳55,000/month

# Research & Innovation
- 15 Research Centers
- ৳50 Crore Research Grants (2024)
- International Collaborations
- 3 Patents Filed (2023-2024)
- 120+ Research Publications Annually

# Infrastructure
- 15-story Engineering Complex (45 labs)
- Medical College (WHO accredited)
- Central Library (100,000+ books)
- Sports Complex
- Hostels (separate for male/female students)
- Modern Cafeteria & Dining Halls
- 100% WiFi Campus

# Accreditation & Recognition
- Government Approved (Education Ministry, Bangladesh)
- University Status Granted (2012)
- WHO Accreditation for Medical Programs (2018)
- Ranked among Top Educational Institutions in Bangladesh
